parameter.name: allowBasicAuth
parameter.label: Allow Basic Authentication
parameter.description: Allow the use of Basic authentication to access protected API resources.

parameter.name: noUnauthenticatedUserRole
parameter.label: Deny unauthenticated access to user operations
parameter.description: By default, operations requiring the "user" role are available when unauthenticated. Enabling this option will require authentication for these operations. Warning: this will cause clients which don't support authorization to break.
